Title: Parameters
BasePoisoningChance.Tooltip: The base chance for food poisoning to occur upon consumption of an item that is not a fruit, a cooked food item or an artisan good.
BaseDuration.Tooltip: The base duration for the length of the Nauseated effect applied upon food poisoning, in seconds.
HarmfulThreshold.Tooltip: Denotes the maximum edibility below which food items are considered Harmful.
HarmfulChanceOffset.Tooltip: The additional chance for food poisoning to occur upon consuming a Harmful food item.
HarmfulDurationOffset.Tooltip: The additional duration, in seconds, added to the Nauseated debuff when applied by consumption of a Harmful food item.
